pages.text: Hellslate can be found in the Nether, appearing inside netherrack, soul sand, and soul soil. Iron is the minimum requirement for extracting Hellslate.
Hellslate's only use is to create Hellsteel.

Combining Hellslate, Iron, and $(l:dndreams:intro/blood_moon#infernal residue)Infernal Residue$(/l), you can create Hellsteel. Hellsteel is light and volatile, and tools made with it require blaze rods for handles.
Wounding your enemies generates a temporary bloodlust, which causes strikes to weaken and slow foes.
Mining causes small explosions. It is recommended to stand back while mining.
Chopping logs fells all connected logs above and beneath the one you chopped.
